title: An Improved Phase Coding Audio Steganography Algorithm
abstract:
Advances in AI technology have made voice cloning increasingly accessible,
leading to a rise in fraud involving AI-generated audio forgeries. This
highlights the need to covertly embed information and verify the authenticity
and integrity of audio. Digital Audio Watermarking plays a crucial role in this
context. This study presents an improved Phase Coding audio steganography
algorithm that segments the audio signal dynamically, embedding data into the
mid-frequency phase components. This approach enhances resistance to
steganalysis, simplifies computation, and ensures secure audio integrity.
